Title: Coronavirus: Digestive symptoms prominent among Covid-19 patients, finds Study - India Today
Description: According to the researchers, nearly half of Covid-19 patients enrolled in the study conducted in the Hubei province of China presented digestive symptoms, such as diarrhea and anorexia, and cited it as their chief complaint.

Title: India uses 123-year-old Act to help authorities curb coronavirus spread - The Straits Times
Description: NEW DELHI - Colonial-era laws are usually outdated pieces of legislation, often out of tune with current realities. But India has fallen back on using a 123-year-old British colonial-era law, first implemented in 1897 to control the spread of bubonic plague, …

Title: China eyes end to coronavirus, plays down warnings of 'second wave' - India Today
Description: As the pandemic continues to spread overseas, a growing number of countries are bracing themselves for a worst-case scenario in which COVID-19 remains in circulation until next year at the earliest.

Title: Will rise in temperature affect coronavirus? AIIMS Director answers this and more - India Today
Description: AIIMS Director Dr Randeep Guleria answers all questions related to the novel coronavirus (COVID-19).
